author: sky.cactus
content: If we do the payment at the execution layer, then the proposer gets paid no matter what I believe.  The question is whether the block builder gets paid or not.  If the body shows up and is available in time for attestations, then the builder will get paid.  If the body doesn't show up in time for attestations, then the builder doesn't get paid.
